data.eml:eml: Spelaeobochica goliath (Arachnida: Pseudoscorpiones: Bochicidae), a new troglobitic pseudoscorpion from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Viana, Ana Clara M., Souza, Maysa F. V. R., Ferreira, Rodrigo L. (2018): Spelaeobochica goliath (Arachnida: Pseudoscorpiones: Bochicidae), a new troglobitic pseudoscorpion from Brazil. Zootaxa 4402 (3): 585-594, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4402.3.11
